snippet.title: Wartorn - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Stray Kite Studios, an indie team composed of developers from games including Age of Empires, Borderlands, and BioShock, is proud to announce its first original title, the gorgeous real-time tactics roguelite Wartorn.

Players follow two elven sisters as they journey to reunite their family. Along the way, they confront moral dilemmas and battle external and internal threats, all while utilizing elemental and physics-based systems in their desperate quest for survival. 

Wartorn is coming to Early Access on Steam and Epic Game Store in Spring 2025!

https://wartorngame.com/ 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1296660/Wartorn/
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/SdpeTRB8ES

Follow on social media:
X: https://x.com/Wartorn_Game
FB: https://www.facebook.com/straykitestudios/
IG: https://www.instagram.com/wartorn_game/
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@straykitestudio

#Wartorn #FantasyGame #roguelite
